Hi [~drankye], can you have a look at the patch?
[~legend] For making such low level change, I would suggest you to _please_ write a test case

Thanks [~shahrs87] for the review.
I couldn't agree with you more. The {{TestPacketReceiver}} exists, and it checks the buff size accurate.
I update the patch that  using the {{totalLen}} instead of {{PacketHeader.PKT_LENGTHS_LEN + dataPlusChecksumLen + headerLen}}, 
so that the {{testReceiveAndMirror}} can make it accurate.
